title: Recent Crackdowns on Human Rights Lawyers
content:
(Upper Left to Right: Jiang Tianyong, Teng Biao, Tang Jitian; Bottom Left to Right: Liu Shihui, Tang Jingling, Li Tiantian) 29 March 2011 The online call for “Jasmine Revolution” in China has seemingly touched the nerves of the Chinese authorities.
